divs: Sighting DetailsIt was the day after my uncles birthday, and we decided to go out for a driveinto the city. I, myself, didnt know my way around the state and this would bea new experience. Ultimately it became a memory I wouldnt forget. That nightas we got near the city, a strange pattern of lights was floating off in thedistance. I noticed but said nothing. It wasnt until I noticed them again andrealized that they were behaving stranger than anything Id ever seen. To mysuprize no one else saw them until I pointed them out. They were the size of anextended fist out on the horizon. Thats when a noise, somewhat of a muffledbuzz, began and so did our car trouble. Our electric equipment alsomalfunctioned. Eventually the objects slowly, but surely dissappeared into thesky above us.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around January 9th 2003
